title: 'The best microfibre hand towels'
body: I bought these more than a year ago and I must say, they are still as bright, fresh and soft as when I purchased them, despite regular use. Incredibly soft, largeish hand towels, they are the perfect size. Far better than any other brand (eg softspun). No regrets whatsoever. Price is just right.  I wish they made large sized bath/beach towels too. I'd snap them up if they were of the same quality as these hand towels and affordable.
